title: Blockchain-based Digital Identity System
shortDescription: A decentralized identity verification platform enabling secure, user-controlled digital credentials for enterprise authentication.
fullDescription: Led the strategic vision and execution of a groundbreaking digital identity platform leveraging blockchain technology. The system enables individuals and organizations to create, manage, and verify digital identities without centralized authorities, reducing fraud by 94% and onboarding time by 78%.
impact: Reduced identity verification time from 5 days to 15 minutes
challenges: Designing intuitive UX for complex blockchain interactions
Scaling consensus mechanisms for enterprise load

title: Scalable Cloud Platform for Enterprise Risk Management
shortDescription: Multi-cloud risk analytics platform processing 500TB+ daily, enabling real-time compliance monitoring across global enterprises.
fullDescription: Architected and launched a comprehensive cloud-native platform for enterprise risk management. The solution integrates with major cloud providers, processes massive data streams in real-time, and provides actionable insights for compliance, security, and operational risk.
impact: Processing 500TB+ data daily across 3 cloud providers
challenges: Achieving real-time processing at massive scale

title: Product Analytics Dashboard with Predictive AI
shortDescription: AI-powered analytics platform providing predictive insights, automated anomaly detection, and prescriptive recommendations for product teams.
fullDescription: Conceptualized and delivered an intelligent analytics dashboard that goes beyond traditional metrics. The platform uses machine learning to predict user behavior, detect anomalies before they impact KPIs, and provide prescriptive recommendations to product managers.
impact: Reduced churn prediction lead time to 14 days
challenges: Making ML predictions actionable for non-technical users
Handling diverse data schemas across integrations
